title: #66 - Ninja Reveals Truth Behind Mixer Disaster & Drake Collab
itunes:title: #66 - Ninja Reveals Truth Behind Mixer Disaster & Drake Collab
description: On this episode of the podcast, Ninja finally comes on as a guest to talk about the Mixer collapse from his perspective, playing Fortnite with Drake, that New Years Eve Event moment that became a meme, Ligma, his love for animation, and more!
content:encoded: On this episode of the podcast, Ninja finally comes on as a guest to talk about the Mixer collapse from his perspective, playing Fortnite with Drake, that New Years Eve Event moment that became a meme, Ligma, his love for animation, and more!
